      • from

        static TransactionSignerImpl from(File walletExport)
                           throws IOException
        Creates a new TransactionSignerImpl from File containing exported wallet
        Parameters:
        walletExport - The File containing an exported wallet
        Returns:
        the TransactionSignerImpl populated with keys from the exported wallet
        Throws:
        IOException - if provided File does not contain exported wallet
